Behavioral.question: Tell me about a time the business problem wasn’t clearly defined. How did you handle it?
What is the project you are most proud of?
Tell me about a time when you had to make a decision with a lot of uncertainty.
How would you convey insights and the methods used to a non-technical audience?
What percentage of users who were active on Messenger yesterday made a video call yesterday?
Tell me about a time when you had to deal with conflicting priorities with your stakeholders and how you secured alignment with them.
Tell me about a time you failed.
Describe a data project you worked on. What were some of the challenges you faced?
Choose a meaningful metric to measure the success of launching bikes as a form of transport for Dashers.
Choose a product you like and explain how you would identify its competitors.
How would you determine if Facebook Messenger should introduce group calling?
Estimate the number of apps available in the Play Store.
There's a YoY slowdown in transactions. How would you structure your analysis?
For a social media app, how would you analyze whether content from friends or content from strangers/creators drives higher engagement?
Meta’s new app shows 25% drop-off at sign-up. How do you analyze this?
Tell me about a time you built a dashboard.
Tell me about a project where you had to clean and organize a large dataset.
Why do you want to work at Atlassian?
How would you model the expected ROI of a new product launch?
How do you consider the impact of your work on the world?
Have you ever had to work with poor-quality data or suggest new tracking?
Delivery times vary significantly by city. How would you identify if it’s a partner, process, or market issue?
55% of users do not complete the application from the application page to the submission page. Why do you think this is the case?
How would you visualize sales and customer usage?
Tell me about a project where you faced data issues and how you handled them.
How do you approach an ambiguous request from a stakeholder?
How do you handle joining data from different sources with inconsistent IDs?
How would you optimize fulfillment time for grocery deliveries in high-traffic zones?
What is the total number of airports in the US and globally?
What would you do if you didn't have access to the exact data you need?
Walk me through how you'd assess the success of a beta launch.
Estimate how many productivity hours are lost per year due to traffic.
Walk me through a time you diagnosed a drop in conversion.
How do you evaluate the ROI of a strategic bet?
Walk me through your process for cleaning a messy dataset.
What questions would you ask before starting an analysis?
We're considering launching in a new city. What data would you look at before recommending a go/no-go decision?
Let’s say a marketing campaign underperformed—what would you do?
How would you estimate the total addressable market (TAM) for a new product?
How would you approach evaluating the performance of a specific business unit?
Tell me about a time when your analysis influenced a business decision.
Estimate the potential number of rides per month for e-scooter rentals in San Francisco.
Have you ever made a decision based on bad data? What did you learn?
What types of visualizations would you use to identify patterns in churn?
How would you segment users for a new e-commerce platform?
How do you present insights to non-technical stakeholders?
Estimate the TAM for electric scooters in San Francisco.
Describe how you’ve used data to identify underperforming business units.
You’re told engagement is flat even though new users are increasing—what questions would you ask and what data would you look at?
How would you size the opportunity for launching a grocery delivery service in a new city?
How do you ensure your data recommendations are actionable and aligned with business goals?
How do you determine which metrics are most important for executives to track?
You’ve been asked to analyze the performance of a newly launched onboarding experience. What steps would you take?
Tell me about a time you discovered a trend by drilling into granular data.
What recommendation did you make based on your analysis, and what was the impact?
How would you identify inefficiencies in a team’s workflow using data?
Describe a time you used data to improve an internal process.
How do you turn analysis into business action?
You’re asked to identify high-value customers—how would you approach this using data?
Tell me how you’d segment customers to support a growth initiative.
How would you evaluate our pricing compared to competitors using publicly available data?

A/B Testing - Design.question: How would you test the viability of expanding Airbnb’s "Restaurant" product to a new region?
How would you test the impact of expanding into a new international market?

Product Analytics.question: You're a Google Ads PM. What metrics would you use to measure the success of Google Ads?
You’re launching a new feature—how would you measure its strategic impact on growth?
What metrics would you use to evaluate product adoption and engagement?
How would you analyze why user engagement is declining?
What metrics would you track to improve operational cost?
How would you measure engagement for a productivity app? What features or behaviors would you track?
After launching a new recommendation engine, how would you measure its impact on revenue?

Root Cause Analysis.question: Why did you choose analytics as a career?
A newly launched mobile app has a 25% drop-off during sign-up. How would you investigate the issue?
How would you explain a sudden drop in revenue to leadership?
A competitor is gaining market share. How would you investigate why?
You’re given product adoption data across regions—how would you determine where the rollout was most successful and why?

Data Analysis - Feature Impact.question: How would you assess whether a new feature launch was successful?
How would you evaluate whether a new feature is worth rolling out to all users?
The leadership team wants to understand the ROI of a new feature—how would you structure that analysis?

Prioritization.question: You have three ideas for expansion but limited resources. How would you help prioritize them?

Stakeholder Communication.question: Suppose adoption is high, but retention is low—how would you diagnose and communicate the issue?

Product Metrics - Definition.question: What KPIs would you track to measure company health?
What KPIs would you track to evaluate the health of a subscription-based business?

Data Analysis - Retention & Churn.question: How would you use cohorts to identify retention issues?
Walk me through how you'd segment users for a churn analysis.

Dashboard & Visualization.question: Walk me through a dashboard you built. What choices did you make?
